call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - November 14th 2024

topics.title: Ergo Names Service Development Progress
topics.summary: MGpai provides update on Ergo Names project development, citing school commitments as the main delay. Smart contracts are complete, with only off-chain infrastructure remaining, targeting Christmas release.

topics.title: Palmyra and ZenGate RWA Development
topics.summary: Discussion of progress on Palmyra's real-world asset trading platform and ZenGate cross-chain functionality. Team is scaling up with new developers to capitalize on RWA opportunities in the current market cycle.

topics.title: Bull Market Analysis and Bitcoin Performance
topics.summary: Analysis of current market conditions with Bitcoin crossing 90k, noting limited altcoin participation compared to previous cycles. Ergo showing better performance than average altcoins with 10-20% gains.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Expansion and DOGE Integration
topics.summary: Updates on Rosen Bridge adding Dogecoin support, leveraging Trump's DOGE department announcement. Binance Smart Chain integration coming to reduce fees compared to Ethereum, with potential Alephium interoperability.

topics.title: Decentralized vs Centralized Exchange Philosophy
topics.summary: Discussion on the importance of decentralized exchanges for crypto's sustainability and unstoppable nature. Addresses geographic restrictions and censorship concerns with centralized platforms.

topics.title: Cyberverse Gaming Support Campaign
topics.summary: Call to action for community to support Cyberverse's application to join Ronin gaming chain. Instructions provided for voting process using Ronin wallet and Discord integration.

topics.title: Sigmanauts Twitter Management and New Multisig
topics.summary: SuperGeometry now managing Sigmanauts Twitter with daily posts and giveaways. New multisig being established with active community members to replace inactive early members, improving transaction efficiency.

topics.title: Paideia DAO Platform Development Status
topics.summary: Paideia moving out of beta after 2-3 years of development. Sigmanauts cautiously managing funds between manual multisig and Paideia platform while building confidence in the system.

topics.title: ErgoPad and Coinecta Platform Challenges
topics.summary: Marty winding down oversight of ErgoPad and Coinecta IDO platforms due to competition from non-KYC alternatives like Paideia and SigmaLock. Code remains available for community takeover.

topics.title: Ergo Foundation Development Funding Overview
topics.summary: MGpai explains EF's role in evaluating development proposals, highlighting support for Sigma Explorer, Stability Nexus, and Cyberverse. Discusses ongoing consideration of Sigmanauts mining proposal for ecosystem growth.

topics.title: Mining Pool Token Payment Innovation
topics.summary: Mark the Shark's mining pool now supports payments in various Rosen tokens and ecosystem tokens. Miners can customize payout percentages and thresholds using NFT-based configuration system.

topics.title: Ergo Mining Profitability and GPU Interest
topics.summary: Ergo achieving top mining profitability rankings on social media, attracting miners to reactivate GPUs. Price around $1.24 making it competitive for GPU mining operations.

topics.title: Keystone Hardware Wallet Integration Status
topics.summary: PGR456 working on Keystone wallet integration with end-of-year target. Currently blocked by Sigma Rust library issues being addressed by developer Dusek.

topics.title: Kraken Exchange Listing Speculation
topics.summary: Discussion of Kraken listing possibility following earlier leak. Ergo confirmed on shortlist but timeline uncertain. Critique of exchanges prioritizing meme tokens over sustainable projects.

topics.title: Cardano Bitcoin Layer 2 Partnership Discussion
topics.summary: Community question about Ergo joining Cardano's Bitcoin layer 2 effort. MGpai explains existing Bitcoin bridge functionality and notes Cardano's ZK proof approach versus Ergo's multisig method.

topics.title: MewFinance Platform Assessment
topics.summary: Positive assessment of MewFinance filling gap left by Spectrum DEX maintenance reduction. Community members actively using marketplace for physical goods including organic honey sales.

topics.title: Meme Strategy and Social Media Content
topics.summary: Discussion of meme content strategy with Joe's viral videos getting 10k views. SuperGeometry handling meme content for Sigmanauts account while main account considering more appropriate meme integration.

topics.title: Non-KYC Bitcoin-Ergo Swapping Options
topics.summary: Explanation of decentralized Bitcoin-Ergo swapping through Rosen Bridge and ErgoDEX. Low liquidity causing 7.8% slippage on large swaps, recommending bridge usage for better rates.

topics.title: Top 20 Market Cap Predictions
topics.summary: Discussion of Ergo's potential to reach top 20 market cap. MGpai notes Ergo's price correlation with Cardano and expresses optimism about ecosystem readiness with sub-blocks coming.

topics.title: Trump Administration Crypto Impact Assessment
topics.summary: Analysis of potential Trump administration impact on crypto, particularly mining. Skeptical about utility focus versus speculation, noting Trump's own token performance as concerning indicator.

topics.title: Palmyra Token Launch Timeline
topics.summary: MGpai unable to provide specific timeline for Palmyra token launch due to confidentiality. Confirms additional pre-sale rounds coming but restricted to non-US citizens.

topics.title: Sky Harbor Marketplace Development Update
topics.summary: Quokka reports Sky Harbor frontend v2 completed and in testing, with backend nearly finished. Plans for Sigmanauts to potentially manage open-source version as revenue stream.

topics.title: TradeHouse Liquidity Provision Campaign
topics.summary: Extended call for community liquidity provision on TradeHouse order book system. Detailed explanation of pricing mechanics and strategy for small individual contributions creating significant collective impact.
